MISSING_VALUE: Size value is missing. A valid size must be provided.
INVALID_TYPE: Size must be a string or a numeric value.
RANDOM_NOISE: Size contains random characters or invalid input. Valid sizes include standard letter sizes (XS, S, M, L, XL, etc.) or numeric sizes.
INVALID_PREFIX: Size value contains an invalid prefix. Remove 'SIZE:' prefix from the value.
FRACTIONAL_SIZE: Invalid fractional size format. Use proper fraction notation without dollar signs.
LEADING_TRAILING_SPACE: Size value contains leading or trailing spaces which should be removed.
APPENDED_SUFFIX: Size value contains unnecessary suffix text in parentheses which should be removed.
DECIMAL_IN_INTEGER: Size value uses decimal notation with a dollar sign. Remove the dollar sign for proper decimal notation.
WRONG_DELIMITER: Size value uses incorrect delimiter. Use '/' instead of '-' for size ranges.
